Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view

Class ViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handles the view screens, and calls server adapters methods in order to communicate with the server

        public void setScreenFactory​(ScreenFactory screenFactory)

      • openConnection

        public void openConnection​(java.lang.String ip,
                           int port)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Open a connection with the server if it is not already open
        Parameters:
        ip - The server hostname
        port - The port address of the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The connection fails to open
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - The connection is already open

        Throws:

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage​(Message<Screen> messageToScreen)
        Receive a message to forward to the screen NOTE: This method is called from the context of the Server Adapter Listener Thread
        Parameters:
        messageToScreen - The message to a Screen

      • changeActiveScreen

        public void changeActiveScreen​(Screen nextActiveScreen)
        Change the screen seen by the users. Doing these calls the onScreenClose() method for the old active screen, and then calls the onScreenOpen() method for the new active screen
        Parameters:
        nextActiveScreen - The new screen to display
